title: How to Destroy a Sim Card

steps.headline: First, if you have a good hand then use it!
steps.description: Punch that sim card as strong as possible with all the strength you got. If you failed to do this step then go to the next step.

steps.headline: If you have a hammer then smash it to destroy that unwanted sim card!
steps.description: After this step you should have bits of pieces of the sim card.

steps.headline: Then, hey!
steps.description: why not burn it? Because it actually works. You just have to build a cozy bonfire sit back and relax and watch your sim card burn.

steps.headline: Bury your sim card.
steps.description: You can bury a deep big hole if you want like your digging to China. After you do this step your sim card will not haunt you again.
